name: Mochat-formerly shuga, Free Meet&Chat
description: MOCHAT is positioned to be an app for African users which focuses on building a wider platform for young people to meet and find new people based on their own interests and hobbies. Apart from the voice/text/pic matching functionality, the platform enables the users to explore more about life by providing other types of social networking features such as news feed, social gaming and chatrooms.  Our unique algorithm improves the matching efficiency by 70% to find the right matches for everyone and with the varieties of entertainment on the platform, users will experience more about social networking.   Mochat Features: Match with people near you who also share your interests and passions. With our filter feature, you can personalize your match filter by setting your date preferences including the age, location, and gender of the people who you are looking for.   Real User: On Mochat, all users are real. Therefore, if you want people to know you better and find the right one quickly, upload your real pictures and complete your profile. The number of users on Mochat has reached 10M, there is always someone right for you.  Multi-Matching Mechanism: A brand new home page with advanced search option enables you to search people nearby, and see online people. Users also can use the Messaging Match and Voice Match features to have message chats and voice chats with others. Meet new friends through activities and fun ways of social games.  Secure: Users personal information is safe on Mochat, it never discloses any user information to third parties.   Easy to Use: Mochat is easy and user friendly. Tap to find matches and explore peoples profiles.  Mobile Data Saving: Mobile Data means a lot to us hence the feature of a low-data consumption mode has been created to help our users save data!   Here you will meet people like you and share your interests and passion.  Mochat assures you of a new lifestyle instead of a boring lifestyle like waking up alone, eating alone, shopping alone, watching a movie alone, etc. On Mochat, you will meet people who are here to meet new people too, which helps you to start a new and ideal friendship with people you like.   All events and rewards are for entertainment purposes only, without any gambling promotions. Google Inc. doesnt sponsor any events and rewards onMochat.   If you have any feedback, questions or concerns, please send an email to shuga@brobonds.com, we will review your feedback and solve them as soon as possible.  MoChat, More to love!
